item.title: O
item.description: score:98 Chances: Realty Income Corporation has declared its 643rd consecutive common stock monthly dividend, showing a consistent and reliable dividend history.The company’s pricing of senior unsecured notes indicates a strong financial position and access to capital.The retail REIT’s track record of dividend growth and monthly payouts makes it an attractive investment for income-oriented investors.
